ops.description: Bank[6][1] = getLastFieldMapId(); // wm does not count

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // {Barret}
“Don't worry about him.
He's a tough one.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // {Barret}
“Alright, I know…
I shouldn't have doubted.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // {Barret}
“But I can't win against you.
You're some kinda lady.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // {Tifa}
“{Barret}…
You came back. I…”{PAUSE}“{Cloud}…
Where is he?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // {Tifa}
“{Barret}…I…
When I was in the Lifestream,
I saw the real {Cloud}.”

dialogStrings:
{Tifa}
“{Barret}…
You came back. I…”{PAUSE}“{Cloud}…
Where is he?”

{Barret}
“Don't worry about him.
He's a tough one.”

{Tifa}
“{Barret}…I…
When I was in the Lifestream,
I saw the real {Cloud}.”

{Tifa}
“I mean, I didn't really find him.
{Cloud}…he found himself…”

{Barret}
“Alright, I know…
I shouldn't have doubted.”

{Barret}
“But I can't win against you.
You're some kinda lady.”

{Tifa}
“People have so many things
pent up inside of themselves…”

{Tifa}
“So many things they
can never forget.”{PAUSE}“Strange…isn't it?”
